quest.name: Good, Honest Dirt
journal:
 Quest Sync
Sylgran is looking for a second opinion.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: Greetings, stranger, and well met. They say folk don't often go out of their way to visit Amity. Me, though, I came here with a mind to raise crops.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: ...What, you don't think a man could farm this land? Well, you seem like a well-traveled lasslad.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: Why don't you head over to my “field” back there, and take a look for yourself. I'd be curious to know what you think my chances are of taming this barren soil...

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: My “field” is just over yonder. It's not much more than a few mounds of dirt at the moment, but a man has to start somewhere, eh?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Nothing seems to be growing here...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The dirt has hardened and cracked...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Even weeds refuse to grow here...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A tiny sprout has emerged, but is already beginning to wilt.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: So, what did you think of my crop?

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: Oho, one of the seeds had sprouted? That's wonderful news! I had no such luck with my previous attempt.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: Aye, even a small victory like that is worthy of celebration─it brings me one step closer to turning my little plot into the farmer's field I now dream of...

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: ...A dream some say will never come true. And yet scratching here in the dirt has already brought me more fulfillment than I ever felt from the empty life I lived in Eulmore.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: Not that I wasn't terrified when they first kicked me out the gate, mind you! Exiled over some petty disagreement, and destitute but for the few pieces of jewelry I concealed upon my person...

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: The sale of those trinkets brought in some meager wealth, which has largely gone towards my agricultural endeavor.

dialogue.name: SYLGRAN
dialogue.text: Thus, should my crops fail to produce a harvest ere my funds are depleted, I shall be left with nothing in this world. Ah, I have never felt so alive! Here, friend─a few coins for your services.
